import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Radium from 'radium'; class PageFive extends Component { externalSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const summary = { s: document.getElementById("mstrg").value, ms_description: event.target["strategy"].value, imc_strategy: document.getElementById("imcstrg").value, imc_description: event.target["imcstrategy"].value, } this.props.bp.marketing.push(summary) }; render() { console.log(document.getElementById("first").value) const style = { backgroundColor: 'lightyellow', border: '2px solid black', ':hover': { backgroundColor: 'lightgreen', color: 'black' } } const inputStyle = { width: '90%', height: '150px' } return (

PAGE 5/6

Human Resource management strategies

1 — Choose the specific HR practices you are going to implement

2 — Choose the specific HR practices you are going to implement

3 — Choose the specific HR practices you are going to implement

4 — Choose the end date

) } } export default Radium(PageFive);
